tasks.label: update-env
args: $ip = (Get-NetIPAddress -AddressFamily IPv4 | Where-Object { $_.IPAddress -notlike '127.*' -and $_.PrefixOrigin -eq 'Dhcp' } | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty IPAddress); $envPath = 'assets/utils/.env'; (Get-Content $envPath) -replace 'BASE_URL\s*=\s*".*"', ('BASE_URL = """http://'+$ip+':5001"""') | Set-Content $envPath; Write-Output ('Updated BASE_URL to "http://'+$ip+':5001" in '+$envPath)
